name: Not As Described
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game is intended for those who have completed some of all of the Five Night's at Freddy's franchise. You must be thirteen or older to play. Warning: Loud noises, flashing images, and jumpscares. Narrators may not be completely reliable.

Hello, and welcome to Darrel's Pizzeria and Arcade! We're glad you have chosen us for your minimum wage summer job! Your security job will be a breeze, even if you haven't finished college yet. It is entry-level but very friendly.

There have been mishaps from time to time within these walls, especially when it came to our various animatronic characters, but there's really nothing to be afraid of. Work the weeknights and make some new robot friends or something. What could go wrong?

Enjoy your new job full of candies and smilles.

DARREL ENT. IS NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DEATH OR DAMAGE TO PERSONS OR PROPERTIES. BASIC INSURANCE DOES NOT COVER SUPERNATURAL HAPPENINGS OR ALIEN ABDUCTION.
